title: [Tuts Plus] Windows Phone 8 Development Video Tutorial-KTR
description:
[Tuts Plus] Windows Phone 8 Development Video Tutorial-KTR



PUBLISHER....: Tuts Plus
LANGUAGE......: ENGLISH 
AUTHOR.......: Derek Jensen
RUNTIME......: 3.1 hours



About this course::

In the landscape of mobile applications these days there are three main players: iOS, Android, and Windows Phone. While Windows Phone may be in a distant third place at the moment, it is definitely growing in popularity and provides an excellent opportunity for developers to capitalize on their skills. This course will show you how to get started developing for Windows Phone, and will provide you with a solid foundation of knowledge in XAML, MVVM, and platform-specific features.



Topics include:

1.Introduction
1.1Welcome


2.Getting Started
2.1Getting Set Up
2.2Overview of Windows Phone 8.1
2.3Windows Phone Project Structure


3.Introduction to XAML
3.1Classes and Properties Using XAML
3.2Collections
3.3Multiple Elements on a Page
3.4Layout Basics


4.The Model-View-ViewModel Pattern
4.1Creating a Model
4.2Creating a View
4.3Creating a ViewModel
4.4Using the INotifyPropertyChanged Interface
4.5Binding the View to the ViewModel
4.6Commands


5.Interacting With the Windows Phone Platform
5.1Handling Gestures
5.2Navigation
5.3Local Storage
5.4Settings
5.5Notifications
5.6Using System Applications
5.7Live Tiles


6.Conclusion
6.1Goodbye
